attributes.description: How many deployments are at risk of data loss, running on a single availability zone.

embeddableConfig.description:
How many deployments are at risk of data loss, running on a single availability zone.
A N/A value indicates no deployments are running on a single zone.
This displays the amount of RAM per deployment, over time.
This displays the amount of RAM per instance type, over time.
The link points to cloud.elastic.co - you will need to alter the runtime field named "Deployment_link" in the data view if you need this link to point to another domain.

attributes.title: [Metrics ESS Billing] Billing dashboard
